judges: WEISBERGER and MURRAY, JJ., did not participate.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
WEISBERGER and MURRAY, JJ., did not participate.

attorneys: Robert R. Noeera, Diocesan Bureau of Social Services, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Mitchell S. Riffkin, Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
In re Thomas JOSEPH.
No. 81-57-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 12, 1981.
Robert R. Noeera, Diocesan Bureau of Social Services, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Mitchell S. Riffkin, Providence, for respondents.
